Hilda Ross1

F, #246461, d. 4 September 1964

Last Edited=12 Oct 2007

Hilda Ross was the daughter of John Ross.2 She married, firstly, Hon. Frederick Henry Hamilton Smith, son of Frederick Henry Smith, 1st Baron Colwyn and Elizabeth Ann Savage, on 14 October 1913.1 She married, secondly, Major J. F. Hardy-Smith on 20 December 1932.1 She died on 4 September 1964.1

From 14 October 1913, her married name became Smith. From 20 December 1932, her married name became Hardy-Smith.1

Frederick John Vivian Smith, 2nd Baron Colwyn1

M, #246462, b. 26 November 1914, d. 29 May 1966

Last Edited=17 Feb 2011

Frederick Smith, 2nd Baron Colwyn 2

Frederick John Vivian Smith, 2nd Baron Colwyn was born on 26 November 1914.1 He was the son of Hon. Frederick Henry Hamilton Smith and Hilda Ross.3 He married, firstly, Miriam Gwendoline Ferguson, daughter of Victor Bruce Ferguson, on 21 December 1940.1 He and Miriam Gwendoline Ferguson were divorced in 1951.1 He married, secondly, Hermione Sophia O'Bryen Hoare, daughter of Cyril Bertie Edward O'Bryen Hoare and Isabel Mary Fielder, on 18 July 1952.1 He and Hermione Sophia O'Bryen Hoare were divorced in 1954.1 He married, thirdly, Beryl Walker, daughter of Harvey Walker, on 8 January 1955.1 He died on 29 May 1966 at age 51.1

He was educated at Malvern College, Malvern, Worcestershire, England .1 He fought in the Second World War, where he was wounded.1 He gained the rank of Captain in the 2nd Battalion, Gordon Highlanders.1 He was a stockbroker.1 He succeeded as the 2nd Baron Colwyn, of Colwyn Bay, co. Denbigh [U.K., 1917] on 26 January 1946.1 He succeeded as the 2nd Baronet Smith, of Colwyn Bay, co. Denbigh [U.K., 1912] on 26 January 1946.1

Children of Frederick John Vivian Smith, 2nd Baron Colwyn and Miriam Gwendoline Ferguson

Nicholas John Ferguson1

M, #246466, b. 17 March 1941

Last Edited=12 Oct 2007

Nicholas John Ferguson was born on 17 March 1941.1 He is the son of Lt.-Col. John Baddeley Bagot Ferguson and Elisabeth Joan Babette Hamilton Smith.2 He married Karen Elisabeth Svansø, daughter of Niels Ladefoged Christensen Svansø, on 8 May 1965.1

He was educated at Michaelhouse School, Balgowan, Natal, South Africa .1 He lived in 2003 at Ashcraig, The Croft, Bures, Essex, England .1
